page.title: 01ARMLEY ENVIRONS,WEST LEEDS
page.content: Includes{Armley}and parts of{ {Wortley,Farnley,Bramley}and{Burley.} The{Aire valley}and{Farsley Beck}cross the block, with the{Leeds-Liverpool {Canal}following the Aire's course. Three major roads and the{Leeds to {Bradford}and to{Harrogate}rail lines cross the area,which is mostly residential with areas of commerce and light industry.{Armley Town Street}has the main concentration of shops and commercial facilities. Areas of Victorian housing remain. Post-war estates, with some high-rise developement have been built.Private and council housing are equally prevalent. Pockets of older housing near the city centre have been occupied by an Asian population. {Public parks}are well provided, with various{sports}facilities. S.W. of the block is{farmland}and{Greenbelt}land.
